items.name: animated-tabs
items.title: Animated Tabs
items.description: A reusable and customizable tabs component built with Radix UI and Motion. Supports smooth sliding highlight animations on tab triggers and fade-in/out transitions for tab content, making tab interactions visually engaging and accessible.

items.name: code-block
items.title: Animated Tabs
items.description: A reusable and customizable code block component built with React and Motion.
